response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and potential for you. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,000,000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this exceptional opportunity at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects my commitment to ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. I believe it presents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
